briefTitle: Anonymous Survey of Breast Cancer Patients Concerning Their Use of Medical Apps
officialTitle: Eine Anonyme Umfrage Bei Brustkrebspatient*Innen Zum Thema Nutzerverhalten Von Gesundheits-Apps
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The attitudes of breast cancer patients regarding the use of medical apps: a survey-based study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer patients
* patients who are legally competent and able to understand and follow instructions of the study staff

Exclusion Criteria:

* none
